points: Skilled at architecting and implementing APIs, applications, and libraries
Thoroughly enjoys solving challenging tasks with inventive tactics

details.tagline: Efficient Arch Linux, i3wm, tmux, and vim environment.
XPath helpers for XML in Sublime Text
Cornerstone, an ES6 Node.js web framework built on express.js

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Work on machine-learning audience segment analysis project.
Work on many internal libraries that benefit most of our products.
Helped develop an API used by all projects within the company, and exposed to many clients.
Created and maintained an app platform, used to build native, mobile, and web apps for restaurants.
Write unit tests aimed at complete code coverage.
Worked with a team building systems and processes used for data analytics.
Contribute to open-source tools, including those created in-house.
Operate in an Agile ecosystem, with daily Scrum meetings and biweekly sprints.
Helped develop dashboard for visualizing and altering data, used both internally and by clients.
Worked on highly-customized mobile and web apps for restaurants.

items.title: Software Architect and Engineer
details: Architected and developed the back-end APIs and event-driven processes.
Developed [http://whitebox.co](http://www.whitebox.co/) as well as their private client-facing real-time dashboards.

items.title: Software Architect and Engineer
details: Develop both internal and external applications.

items.title: Software Architect and Engineer
details: Create custom web applications for a wide range of clients and purposes.
Created and maintain in-house Node.js framework, Cornerstone.
Publish and contribute multiple open-source libraries and tools.

items.title: Senior Software Developer
details: Built large-scale custom applications for internal use by insurance companies.
Implemented complex form logic adhering to insurance industry standards, with rich user-interfaces.
Administered Linux/Windows servers and network devices as a team member.

items.title: Information Systems Analyst
details: Maintained servers, computers, databases, and cash registers across the park.
Designed and developed websites and apps in use on the company-wide Intranet.
Administered Active Directory, Exchange, and other servers as a team member.
Fixed computer, network, and point-of-sale issues across the company.
